Ensure at least one file(s) named ^.+$ in /etc/cron.hourly exists and matches pattern ^\s*([^#\n\r]+\s+)?\/usr\/sbin\/aide\s(--?\S+\s)*--(check|update)\b.*$

Ensure at least one file(s) named ^.+$ in /etc/cron.weekly exists and matches pattern ^\s*([^#\n\r]+\s+)?\/usr\/sbin\/aide\s(--?\S+\s)*--(check|update)\b.*$

Ensure at least one file(s) named aidecheck.service in /etc/systemd/system/ exists and matches pattern ^\s*ExecStart=\/usr\/sbin\/aide\s(--?\S+\s)*--(check|update)\b.*$
